document_data.name: Ra'id bin Kawthar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ra'id bin Kawthar''' was a [[aquatic elf|sea elf]] living in [[Chaos Bay]] near [[Hawa]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name="CotGS.CG-p7" >
document_data.Personality: Ra'id was friendly and highly intelligent.
document_data.Activities: On occasion, he served as a navigator for ships entering Chaos Bay, assisting their captains to safely pass through the deadly coral maze lurking beneath the waves.
document_data.Possessions: Ra'id used a magical [[spear]] or a normal [[short sword]] during combat.
document_data.Relationships: Ra'id was the son of the leader of the sea elves inhabiting the coral maze of Chaos Bay.
